name: Air Battle of Britain
description:
Air Battle of Britain is a 3d WWII air combat game, a flight sim with accelerometer control, photo-realistic scene, and battle missions based on true history.
----------------------------------------
-- F E A T U R E S
----------------------------------------
* Control your fighter with accelerometer.
* Realistic flying control with full 360 degree of pitch/roll/yaw.
* Battle take place in photo-realistic scene.(Please check the screenshot)
* Universal App, Support Retina Display.
* Accurate 3D model for major aircrafts in Battle of Britain.
* Dogfight with enemy fighter.
* Intercept large enemy bomber raids.
* 3 different view mode (Normal/Full screen/Target follow)
* Campaign missions based on true history of Battle of Britain, from July 10th to Sept 15th, 1940.
(Full version has 24 missions, lite version has 5 missions)
* Movie clips of documentaries film for each 2 mission pass.
* Battle of Britain history for reading.
* Full user manual.
* Competible with Fling, tactile game controller for iPhone/iPad.
( http://tenonedesign.com/fling.php )

-- M A N U A L
----------------------------------------
Not familiar with flight sim or having difficulty to play?
You can learn how to fly, and intercept/dogfight in help manual.
Or simply watch the demon videos, with a little practice you sure can handle it.

----------------------------------------
-- H I S T O R Y
----------------------------------------
From July to September 1940 the Battle of Britain raged between the German Luftwaffe and British RAF, the first major campaign fought entirely in the air.

All the missions are based on true history. You can read detail story about the battle you are going to fight. Documentary video clips provides more historical image of the battle.

You will be flying British's finest fighter Supermarine Spitfire. Dogfight with Luftwaffe's prominent fighter Messerschmitt Bf-109, or intercept the Junkers Ju-87 dive bomber 'Stuka', which was a symbol of German air power. All the other major aircrafts in Battle of Britain are present, include British's another legend fighter Hawk Hurricane, German twin engine fighter Messerschmitt Bf-110, and 3 German Bombers Dornier Do-17 'flying pencil', Henkel He-111 and Junkers Ju-88.
